sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

fMRImotion(max)-run1.Description: the maximum head movement data (° OR mm) in run1

exclusion-run1.Description: The exclusion is recommended due to head motion exceeding the size of 1 voxel in run1.

fMRImotion(max)-run2.Description: the maximum head movement data (° OR mm) in run2

exclusion-run2.Description: The exclusion is recommended due to head motion exceeding the size of 1 voxel in run2.

NFC.Description: the score of the Need for Cognition questionnaire

CRT.Description: the score of the Cognitive Reflection Test

traitFOM.Description: the score of the Fear of Missing out subscale, which primarily describes an  individual's trait-level sensitivity to the fear of missing out on information

stateFOM.Description: the score of the Fear of Missing out subscale, which primarily describes an  individual's state-level sensitivity to the fear of missing out on information
